projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Pocket Notes App
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a responsive web app for managing notes with timestamps.
 - Users can easily add, review, and organize notes by creation time.
 - Ensured seamless user experience across devices.

projects.title: AI_Code_Reviewer
projects.bodyText:
- Built an AI-powered code review platform using OpenAI Codex to analyze and provide smart code suggestions
- Integrated with React and FastAPI, achieving a 30% reduction in manual review time
- Utilized PostgreSQL for storing review feedback and code history across sessions

projects.title: AI_Assignment_Generator
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an AI-powered tool for auto-generating academic assignments.
 - Streamlined content creation with a clean, responsive UI for all devices.
